name: Super Aleksandr and The Round World
name_original: Super Aleksandr and The Round World
description:
Take control of Aleksandr, a man desperate to prove his theory about the flat Earth. Use your platforming skills in this absolutely brutal platformer.

Versions-

Version 1.0 (August 31, 2019)- This is an unfinished build of the game made in 4 hours that had to be uploaded in time for the Community Game Jam 2019.

Credits/Assets Used:

All assets (music, art, etc) were made by Black Frog Studios, except for the Cinemachine asset made by Unity Technologies.
